notes: Clean and spacious apartment with laminate wood flooring throughout. The unit has older window-unit AC systems and dated fixtures (crown molding, older-style light fixtures), indicating an older building from the 1990s or earlier. Balcony has metal security grilles which provide good baby safety; windows also have security grilles. Good natural light from large windows. The raised wooden platform in one room could be a minor trip hazard for a crawling baby.
